Yup.
While I may have had my disagreements with Mr. Roger Ebert in the past, I always respected him. He judged every movie as objectively as possible and never had had any expectations. He go into a movie like Beauty and the Beast the same way he'd go into The Silence of the Lambs. He judged a movie on wheter or not it was good. Not to mention he liked Space Jam and anyone who does that CAN'T be a bad person.
